example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اعلنت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM اسرائيل)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC قوات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اسرت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC فلسطينيا)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN طريق) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تنفيذ) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN هجوم))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تفجير) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نفس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: a Palestinian on his way to carry out a suicidal attack

example.arg: فلسطينيا كان في طريقه إلى تنفيذ هجوماً بتفجير نفسه
